```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
dataFile <- "processed_data/avglaptime.csv"
df_avgLapTimes <- read.csv(dataFile)
```

```{r}
df_avgLapTimes %>%
  filter(raceId == 3)%>%
  mutate(driverId = fct_reorder(as.character(driverId),avg_lap))%>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = driverId, y = avg_lap)) +
  geom_point()

df_avgLapTimes %>%
  filter(raceId == 3)%>%
  mutate(constructorId = fct_reorder(as.character(constructorId),avg_lap))%>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = constructorId, y = avg_lap)) +
  geom_point()
```
